resources:
Water West App
--App intro-- Title 1 Welcome How to Use
--Descriptions-- desc 1 Hello! Welcome to the WaterWest App! In here you can monitor your water supply in your water tank! In the main page you can find the amount of water you have in your tank and your daily usage, as well as you can go to your alerts or look at your usage history
--Button-- Skip Next Lets Get Started
